name: BBa_K4162001
title: StayGold = (n2)oxStayGold(c4)v2.0
description:
The ybbO gene was confirmed to have a retinol dehydrogenase activity that is able to convert retinal into retinol, a property that could be used for the
selective production of retinol from E. coli.
source: The ybbO gene is reported to have transferred from an eukaryotic retinol dehydrogenase ancestor to the E. coli genome in the human intestine via horizontal gene transfer, as shown by sequence comparison and phylogenetic analysis.
